product_name: REI Heavyweight Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's
long_description: Whether you're hiking, skiing, snowshoeing or mountaineering, men's REI Heavyweight long underwear bottoms will help you feel warmer, drier and more comfortable. This base layer's heavyweight polyester/spandex fabric wicks sweat and dries fast; brushed inner face provides a soft touch. 4-way stretch enhances comfort and provides a full range of motion; fabric also offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Men's REI Heavyweight long underwear bottoms have nonchafing flatseam construction and a smooth outer surface that make them easy to layer under other clothing. Bottoms also include a plush elastic waistband and functional fly.
